text: The vision [strongs id="h2377" /] of Obadiah [strongs id="h5662" /]. Thus saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] the Lord [strongs id="h0136" /] GOD [strongs id="h3069" /] concerning Edom [strongs id="h0123" /]; We have heard [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8804" /] a rumour [strongs id="h8052" /] from the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], and an ambassador [strongs id="h6735" /] is sent [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8795" /] among the heathen [strongs id="h1471" /], Arise [strongs id="h6965" tvm="8798" /] ye, and let us rise up [strongs id="h6965" tvm="8799" /] against her in battle [strongs id="h4421" /].

Behold, I have made [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] thee small [strongs id="h6996" /] among the heathen [strongs id="h1471" /]: thou art greatly [strongs id="h3966" /] despised [strongs id="h0959" tvm="8803" /].

The pride [strongs id="h2087" /] of thine heart [strongs id="h3820" /] hath deceived [strongs id="h5377" tvm="8689" /] thee, thou that dwellest [strongs id="h7931" tvm="8802" /] in the clefts [strongs id="h2288" /] of the rock [strongs id="h5553" /], whose habitation [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8800" /] [is] high [strongs id="h4791" /]; that saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8802" /] in his heart [strongs id="h3820" /], Who shall bring me down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8686" /] to the ground [strongs id="h0776" /]?

Though thou exalt [strongs id="h1361" tvm="8686" /] [thyself] as the eagle [strongs id="h5404" /], and though thou set [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8800" /] thy nest [strongs id="h7064" /] among the stars [strongs id="h3556" /], thence will I bring thee down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8686" /], saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /].

If thieves [strongs id="h1590" /] came [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8804" /] to thee, if robbers [strongs id="h7703" tvm="8802" /] by night [strongs id="h3915" /], (how art thou cut off [strongs id="h1820" tvm="8738" /]!) would they not have stolen [strongs id="h1589" tvm="8799" /] till they had enough [strongs id="h1767" /]? if the grapegatherers [strongs id="h1219" tvm="8802" /] came [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8804" /] to thee, would they not leave [strongs id="h7604" tvm="8686" /] [some] grapes [strongs id="h5955" /]?
How are [the things] of Esau [strongs id="h6215" /] searched out [strongs id="h2664" tvm="8738" /]! [how] are his hidden [strongs id="h4710" /] things sought up [strongs id="h1158" tvm="8738" /]!

All the men [strongs id="h0582" /] of thy confederacy [strongs id="h1285" /] have brought [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8765" /] thee [even] to the border [strongs id="h1366" /]: the men [strongs id="h0582" /] that were at peace [strongs id="h7965" /] with thee have deceived [strongs id="h5377" tvm="8689" /] thee, [and] prevailed [strongs id="h3201" tvm="8804" /] against thee; [they that eat] thy bread [strongs id="h3899" /] have laid [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8799" /] a wound [strongs id="h4204" /] under thee: [there is] none understanding [strongs id="h8394" /] in him.

Shall I not in that day [strongs id="h3117" /], saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], even destroy [strongs id="h0006" tvm="8689" /] the wise [strongs id="h2450" /] [men] out of Edom [strongs id="h0123" /], and understanding [strongs id="h8394" /] out of the mount [strongs id="h2022" /] of Esau [strongs id="h6215" /]?

And thy mighty [strongs id="h1368" /] [men], O Teman [strongs id="h8487" /], shall be dismayed [strongs id="h2865" tvm="8804" /], to the end that every one [strongs id="h0376" /] of the mount [strongs id="h2022" /] of Esau [strongs id="h6215" /] may be cut off [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8735" /] by slaughter [strongs id="h6993" /].

For [thy] violence [strongs id="h2555" /] against thy brother [strongs id="h0251" /] Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /] shame [strongs id="h0955" /] shall cover [strongs id="h3680" tvm="8762" /] thee, and thou shalt be cut off [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8738" /] for ever [strongs id="h5769" /].

In the day [strongs id="h3117" /] that thou stoodest [strongs id="h5975" tvm="8800" /] on the other side, in the day [strongs id="h3117" /] that the strangers [strongs id="h2114" tvm="8801" /] carried away captive [strongs id="h7617" tvm="8800" /] his forces [strongs id="h2428" /], and foreigners [strongs id="h5237" /] entered [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8804" /] into his gates [strongs id="h8179" /], and cast [strongs id="h3032" tvm="8804" /] lots [strongs id="h1486" /] upon Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /], even thou [wast] as one [strongs id="h0259" /] of them.

But thou shouldest not have looked [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8799" /] on the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of thy brother [strongs id="h0251" /] in the day [strongs id="h3117" /] that he became a stranger [strongs id="h5235" /]; neither shouldest thou have rejoiced [strongs id="h8055" tvm="8799" /] over the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /] in the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of their destruction [strongs id="h0006" tvm="8800" /]; neither shouldest thou have spoken [strongs id="h6310" /] proudly [strongs id="h1431" tvm="8686" /] in the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of distress [strongs id="h6869" /].

Thou shouldest not have entered [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /] into the gate [strongs id="h8179" /] of my people [strongs id="h5971" /] in the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of their calamity [strongs id="h0343" /]; yea, thou shouldest not have looked [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8799" /] on their affliction [strongs id="h7451" /] in the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of their calamity [strongs id="h0343" /], nor have laid [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8799" /] [hands] on their substance [strongs id="h2428" /] in the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of their calamity [strongs id="h0343" /];

Neither shouldest thou have stood [strongs id="h5975" tvm="8799" /] in the crossway [strongs id="h6563" /], to cut off [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8687" /] those of his that did escape [strongs id="h6412" /]; neither shouldest thou have delivered up [strongs id="h5462" tvm="8686" /] those of his that did remain [strongs id="h8300" /] in the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of distress [strongs id="h6869" /].

For the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] [is] near [strongs id="h7138" /] upon all the heathen [strongs id="h1471" /]: as thou hast done [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /], it shall be done [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8735" /] unto thee: thy reward [strongs id="h1576" /] shall return [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8799" /] upon thine own head [strongs id="h7218" /].

For as ye have drunk [strongs id="h8354" tvm="8804" /] upon my holy [strongs id="h6944" /] mountain [strongs id="h2022" /], [so] shall all the heathen [strongs id="h1471" /] drink [strongs id="h8354" tvm="8799" /] continually [strongs id="h8548" /], yea, they shall drink [strongs id="h8354" tvm="8804" /], and they shall swallow down [strongs id="h3886" tvm="8804" /], and they shall be as though they had not [strongs id="h3808" /] been.

But upon mount [strongs id="h2022" /] Zion [strongs id="h6726" /] shall be deliverance [strongs id="h6413" /], and there shall be holiness [strongs id="h6944" /]; and the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /] shall possess [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8804" /] their possessions [strongs id="h4180" /].

And the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /] shall be a fire [strongs id="h0784" /], and the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Joseph [strongs id="h3130" /] a flame [strongs id="h3852" /], and the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Esau [strongs id="h6215" /] for stubble [strongs id="h7179" /], and they shall kindle [strongs id="h1814" tvm="8804" /] in them, and devour [strongs id="h0398" tvm="8804" /] them; and there shall not be [any] remaining [strongs id="h8300" /] of the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Esau [strongs id="h6215" /]; for the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath spoken [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8765" /] [it].

And [they of] the south [strongs id="h5045" /] shall possess [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8804" /] the mount [strongs id="h2022" /] of Esau [strongs id="h6215" /]; and [they of] the plain [strongs id="h8219" /] the Philistines [strongs id="h6430" /]: and they shall possess [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8804" /] the fields [strongs id="h7704" /] of Ephraim [strongs id="h0669" /], and the fields [strongs id="h7704" /] of Samaria [strongs id="h8111" /]: and Benjamin [strongs id="h1144" /] [shall possess] Gilead [strongs id="h1568" /].

And the captivity [strongs id="h1546" /] of this host [strongs id="h2426" /] of the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /] [shall possess] that of the Canaanites [strongs id="h3669" /], [even] unto Zarephath [strongs id="h6886" /]; and the captivity [strongs id="h1546" /] of Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /], which [is] in Sepharad [strongs id="h5614" /], shall possess [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8799" /] the cities [strongs id="h5892" /] of the south [strongs id="h5045" /].

And saviours [strongs id="h3467" tvm="8688" /] shall come up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8804" /] on mount [strongs id="h2022" /] Zion [strongs id="h6726" /] to judge [strongs id="h8199" tvm="8800" /] the mount [strongs id="h2022" /] of Esau [strongs id="h6215" /]; and the kingdom [strongs id="h4410" /] shall be the LORDâ€™S [strongs id="h3068" /].
